vote.text: Amendment SA 6508 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 6508 proposed by Senator Hassan for Senator Shaheen. (consideration: CR S7040; text: CR S7040) To amend the preamble.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6508 proposed by Senator Hassan for Senator Shaheen.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 6508 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
